bibl.title: Holocaust, Two Millennia Ago.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Polacek, Adalbert

bibl.note: Many a modern phenomenon has its counterpart in events of the past. The events of the years 38 and 1938 A.D. can be juxtaposed with profit, and the comparison can highlight not only a time long past, but also the recent past and the present.
Polacek Adalbert, Holocaust, Two Millennia Ago.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 699-706.
